dmca.title: THATSAWRAPPER.COM - Copyright Infringement Notice under the Digital Millennium Copyri
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: Saraduke, Martha [mailto:msaraduke@hersheys.com] 
Sent: Wednesday, September 15, 2004 10:00 AM
To: copyright@theplanet.com
Cc: Kling, Leah; Tepper, Maury; Danz, Carol; Vettori, Linda
Subject: THATSAWRAPPER.COM - Copyright Infringement Notice under the Digital
Millennium Copyright Act 

 

Please see the attached notice of Copyright Infringement. 

  _____  



 


 

Martha L. Saraduke, President & Counsel 


Direct Dial:        (303) 463-6552


Email:  msaraduke@hersheys.com

 

 

 

 

 

September 14, 2004

 

VIA EMAIL followed by US Mail

ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc.

1333 Stemmons Freeway, Suite 110

Dallas, TX 75207

copyright@theplanet.com

Attn:    Lance Crosby, Esq.

            Chief Operating Officer

 

Re:       Copyright Infringement Notice under the Digital Millennium
Copyright Act Regarding: WWW.THATSAWRAPPER.COM

 

Dear Sir/Madam:

 

I am counsel for Hershey Chocolate & Confectionery Corporation (hereinafter,
"Hershey").  This letter constitutes notice of copyright infringement under
the Digital Millennium Copyright Act ("DMCA").  We address this letter to
you because the name servers for the offending domain, THATSAWRAPPER.COM,
are listed as NS1.THEPLANET.COM and NS2.THEPLANET.COM.

 

The website THATSAWRAPPER.COM offers birth announcement and other candy
wrapper announcement products that infringe the trademark and copyright
rights owned by Hershey.   As required by Section 512(c)(3) of the DMCA, the
details of these infringements are given below.

 

In accordance with the DMCA Section 512, Hershey demands that the website
THATSAWRAPPER.COM, be taken down or access to the infringing material on
this website be blocked.

 

1.         Identification of the copyrighted works claimed to have been
infringed.

            Hershey Chocolate & Confectionery Corporation owns exclusive
rights to use and/or license others to use the HERSHEY'SR trade dress and
the following copyrights that protect that trade dress:




Copyrights Registrations- 

 

1.       VAu 522-804 - Effective as of September 4, 2001, known as "Special
Events Collection No. 1", which protects, inter alia, the following designs:

                                  

 

2.       VAu 521-856 -Effective as of September 4, 2001, known as "Special
Events Collection No. 2" , which protects, inter alia, the following
designs:

                                                 

 

3.       VAu 525-590 - Effective as of September 4, 2001, known as "Special
Events Collection No. 3" , which protects, inter alia, the following
designs:

                                                        

 

4.       VAu 525-588 - Effective as of September 4, 2001, known as "Special
Events Collection No. 5", which protects, inter alia, the following designs:

                 




 

5.       VAu 525-589 - Effective as of September 4, 2001, known as "Special
Events Collection No. 6", which protects, inter alia, the following designs:

                 

 

6.       VAu 521-284 - Effective as of September 4, 2001, known as "Special
Events Collection No. 7" , which protects, inter alia, the following
designs:

                                                     

 

2.         Identification of the material that is claimed to be infringing
or to be the subject of infringing activity and that is to be removed or
access to which is to be disabled, and information reasonably sufficient to
permit the service provider to locate the material.

Attached as Exhibits 1 to 3 to this letter are images from the
THATSAWRAP.COM website identifying in red ovals the materials that infringe
Hershey's copyrights.   Each image identifies the specific web address at
which these infringements are found.

3.         Information reasonably sufficient to permit the service provider
to contact the complaining party, such as an address, telephone number, and,
if available, an electronic mail address at which the complaining party may
be contacted:  

Martha L. Saraduke

President & Counsel

HERSHEY CHOCOLATE & CONFECTIONERY CORPORATION

4860 Robb Street, Suite 204

Wheat Ridge, CO 80033

(303) 463-6552

msaraduke@hersheys.com

4.         A statement that the complaining party has a good faith belief
that use of the material in the manner complained of is not authorized by
the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

I verify that I have a good faith belief that the birth announcement and
other candy wrapper announcements shown on the referenced websites that bear
Hershey's trade dress are confusingly similar and infringe the designs
protected by Hershey's copyrights and that they are not authorized by the
copyright owner, its agents or the law. 

I further verify that I have a good faith belief that, the use of a trade
dress confusingly similar to the trademarked and copyrighted trade dress
associated with the famous HERSHEY'S milk chocolate bar on candy wrapper
announcements offered for sale on the referenced website infringes Hershey's
copyrights and has not been authorized by the copyright owner, its agents or
the law.  

5.         A statement that the notification is accurate, and under penalty
of perjury, that the complaining party is authorized to act on behalf of the
owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed. 

            I, Martha L. Saraduke, President and Counsel of Hershey
Chocolate & Confectionery Corporation state under penalty of perjury that
the above information is accurate and I am authorized to make the statements
given in this letter on behalf of Hershey Chocolate & Confectionery
Corporation, the owner of the intellectual property rights outlined in
Section 1 above.

Relief Requested

Based upon the forgoing information, Hershey Chocolate & Confectionery
Corporation requests that THATSAPLANET take down or block access to the
infringing material on the website THATSAWRAPPER.COM. 

 

Very truly yours,

 

 

Martha L. Saraduke

President & Counsel

HERSHEY CHOCOLATE & CONFECTIONERY CORPORATION

4860 Robb Street, Suite 204

Wheat Ridge, CO 80033

(303) 463-6552

msaraduke@hersheys.com

 

Encl.

C:            L.S. Vettori, Maury M. Tepper, III, Esq. (Womble Carlyle
Sandridge & Rice, PLLC)
